PageTitle: peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate(BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view)(IPv4)
FuncDef:
The peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command activates the g-shut function for a specified peer.
The undo peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command restores the default configuration. The peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command activates the g-shut function for a specified peer. The undo peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command restores the default configuration. By default, the g-shut function of a peer is not activated.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv4 address of a peer.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Deactivates the g-shut feature of a peer. The difference between this parameter and the undo command is that this parameter enables the device not to inherit the g-shut activation status of a peer group.
-

ExtraInfo: You can run this command to activate the g-shut feature for a single peer.
